contextId.information: The words "poor" and "important" are two extremes, which together mean "anyone." You can translate this to clarify the terms. AT: "You must not show favoritism to anyone based on how much money they have" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_merism]])
contextId.quote: You must not show favoritism to someone because he is poor, and you must not show favoritism to someone because he is important
